channel.title: CVE Feed for Semenov -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Semenov -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-30195|2024-08-02T01:25:03.418Z -- semenov -- new%20royalslider
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Semenov New RoyalSlider allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects New RoyalSlider: from n/a through 3.4.2.
